content.question: Which of the following is a visual characteristic of Travelers among Mountains and Streams that contributes to the illusion of deep space?

choices.label: The use of only black and its tints instead of a range of colors
The overlapping forms of the foreground, middle ground, and background
The strong horizontal division created by the roadway near the bottom of the work
The rhythm created by the lines that indicate the rock formations of the mountains

content.answer: The overlapping forms of the foreground, middle ground, and background

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
